text:
@WhiteHouse What?
You mean you didn't defeat it already?
WTHeck!? You're sending us all out, opening up US, and you ovididiots haven't killed the CORONAVIRUS???!!!
WHY THE HECK SEND MILLIONS OF AMERICANS ONTO THE street, stores, restaurants, beaches, theaters, meat-packing plants, offices?
